file_content.text: This is it. Malgus's space station. And thanks to my flying skills, they don't even know we're here.
Welcome aboard, my Republic friends. This is Darth Malgus speaking.
The old Empire may have failed to destroy you, but all it lacked was organization.
That doesn't sound good.
Here we are. Looks like they haven't detected us yet.
This is Darth Malgus speaking. Make yourself at home. This station recently belonged to the late Emperor.
Soon you will join him in the ether, and the Empire will be reborn.
Sensors are picking up movement. Get ready.
This baby's ready to fly. Heading outside to make myself useful.
Systems are back online. Taking off to hammer the station from outside.
Just heard from the Supreme Commander. The Republic fleet is on its way!
Grand Moff Regus just sent word. The Imperial fleet will be here shortly!
Can't shake these fighters. Afraid you're on your own. Maybe you can use the station's defenses against him.
Can't assist! Fighters on my tail! Look for defensive turrets, something to turn against that scum.
Good shot!
Most impressive.
The Republic fleet is here! Good to see you, boys!
The Imperial fleet has arrived!
These stealth fighters are giving the fleet trouble. I've blasted my share, but they keep coming!
There's no end to these stealth fighters. I've scratched dozens, and they're still swarming!
Ha! The station's cannons are firing on the stealth armada! Whatever you did, it's working!
Lovely. The station is firing on its own stealth armada. I trust you're responsible for this.
Those cannons just wiped out another Republic capital ship. We can't hold out much longer.
The Imperial fleet's taking heavy casualties. If you're going to do something, do it now!
He's dead. Darth Malgus is dead!
I won't let you miss the celebration. Get to the hangars. I'll see you there!
Thus the false Emperor is dethroned.
I won't let you join Malgus in death. Hurry to the hangars. I'm coming for you!
Hurry! Get in!
Move, move, move!
Jindo Krey was among the first to join me. He will become a martyr, and others will flock to continue his fight.
The Trandoshans' capacity for warfare is remarkable. Your Republic's disinterest in their species led them right into my care. Thank you.
The Trandoshans are fierce, loyal warriors. Shunning them was the fault of the shortsighted Dark Council.
Look around you. This station's power is a testament to the Anomids' technical prowess.
The Republic claimed the Schism Collective's experiments were repulsive and turned them away. How fatally shortsighted.
The old Empire shunned them, but I encouraged and embraced their talents. Thus, tolerance breeds strength.
Your fleet arrived quickly, but it's of little consequence.
My station will obliterate them. And in the Republic's defeat, the galaxy will recognize the power of the new Empire.
Your fleet is outdated and weak, I will rebuild it from the scraps.
My armada will crush them and show the galaxy that a new order has been born.
HK-47 was a psychopath, but he was programmed that way. Remind me, how many thousands have you slaughtered?
One of you has vowed to join the new Empire. But which one? I'm certainly not telling.
I understand you've been here before, Jedi. But the Emperor you defeated was a shadow of my power.
I sense your approach, Jedi. And your fear. Come before me, and I will judge your might with the Force.
Havoc Squad taught you to guard against betrayal, yet your Supreme Commander easily duped you into this futile mission. Once a pawn, always a pawn.
The Republic must be desperate if they're sending a lone smuggler to do me in. Should I be insulted?
Have you killed everyone you know? The few survivors must fear you. Even if you return victorious, how long until they turn against you?
The Dark Council has betrayed you. They manipulated you into coming here. Sacrifice yourself to me, and their deception is complete.
Look at you. A spy without an Intelligence network. Your Empire has abandoned you once, and they will do so again.
The Schism Collective has procured your bank records, hunter. The Empire's paid you well. Turn around, or I'll liquidate every last credit.
You dare face me alone? How bold... and foolish.
Attention: Self-destruct has been engaged. Evacuate all vital personnel.
Warning: Estimated blast radius one point nine-two kilometers. Minimum safe distance: two point four kilometers.
Secondary systems failure. Core power levels critical.
Reactor overload. Primary systems failing. Meltdown imminent.
Look around you. This station's power is a testament to the Anomids' technical prowess.
